spec_data.Name: dnssec-tools-perlmods
spec_data.Description:
The dnssec-tools project comes with a number of perl modules that are
required by the DNSSEC tools themselves as well as modules that are
useful for other developers.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 27 Feb 2017 12:53:50 AM EST, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl modules supporting DNSSEC (needed by the dnssec-tools)
